reference_summary:
Bath Roman Japanese Cypress (Hinoki) Bath Salts - 680g
EARTH
['Japanese Bathsalt Bathroman cypress bath']
{'Brand': 'EARTH', 'Unit Count': '680 gram', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Item Weight': '1.8 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.6 x 3.4 inches; 1.76 Pounds', 'Item model number': '4901080536013', 'Manufacturer': 'Bathroman'}
I enjoy woodsy, earthy scents so this was a great choice. This hinoki smells like evergreen, dry cedar, with a lemon-like undertone; the scent has a calming effect and lasts throughout your soak. You can splurge a little for these salts because you only need to use a small amount to get the full effect.
Sacred Hinoki - Calming, Grounding Scent
ITECHNIK Sonic Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush for Adults, with TPU Wrapped Handle, Inductive Fast Charge, 5 Brushing Modes, Waterproof, Smart Timer, 3 Replacement Heads&Covers, ST-102 (Black)
ITECHNIK
{'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '779186943264'}
The top settings are very strong and get your teeth clean. The lowest setting however are perfect for sensitive teeth. Unit charges really fast and can be plugged into a laptop or phone charger for travel. I also like the fact that the charger is a little more present than some others, so you can find it more easier. I had one with just a cable and the cable got tossed. The faux leather on the back fits well into any size hands.
Fast and Functional
Queendom Unlashed Mascara | Volumizing and Lengthening | Boosts Lash Length | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
Queendom
{'Package Dimensions': '5.28 x 0.94 x 0.63 inches; 0.85 Ounces'}
This mascara provides volume and length, but at a clumpy price. The wand is great for separation of each lash which helps evenly apply the formula to each lash. The formula goes on kind of clumpy as shown by other reviewers and flakes with wear. I had to wipe the fallout twice which would be terrible if I were wearing full coverage foundation. It does, however, remove easy with facial wipes.
Volumizing at a Cost
Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen – Produces Longer, Healthier, Denser Lashes and Thicker Brows – Eyelash Serum – Boosts Skin Collagen – Drug-Free Formula - 1 fl oz.
Veta
{'Color': 'Silver, Black', 'Brand': 'Veta', 'Item Form': 'lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.61 x 1.57 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '861121002645'}
I thought this might be a gimmick, but it honestly showed results. It won't regrow lost hairs or give you brand new volume you never had, but it promotes healthy growth in the hair you have. I lost some eyelashes due to a cruddy fake lash application. Using this regrowth was pretty obvious and lashes looked longer and fuller.
Promotes Healthy Hairs
Cremorlab Mineral Treatment Essence 9.1 Fl. Oz. 270ml Water Essence, Serum for Face, Face Moisturizer
CREMORLAB
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.76 x 2.13 x 6.69 inches; 11.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8.80934E+12'}
I used for more than a month with no visible results. I still have clogged pores and dry skin. I haven't experienced any I'll effects, but I was hoping for basic results.
No Effects
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preferences**: Enjoys woodsy and earthy scents that evoke nature, particularly cedar and evergreen, often with citrus undertones for calming effects.

- **Product Types**: Prefers natural bath products, especially bath salts that enhance the bathing experience. Also shows interest in personal care items that improve daily hygiene routines with functional benefits.

- **User Experience**: Values high-quality products offering strong sensory experiences and lasting effects. Demonstrates a preference for premium options in both bath and personal care categories, including cosmetics.

- **Cosmetic Preferences**: Recent exploration of volumizing and lengthening products indicates a focus on effective cosmetics. Values quality and performance, balancing efficacy with usability during application and wear.

- **Sensory Effects**: Seeks calming and grounding experiences from bath products, aligning with a focus on relaxation and stress relief. Also interested in devices that enhance overall well-being while being user-friendly.

- **Usage Pattern**: Appreciates products requiring small amounts for maximum benefit, reflecting a conscientious consumption approach. This applies to both bath and personal care items, including multifunctional cosmetics suitable for varying needs.

- **Recent Interactions**: The user recently purchased a moisture serum aimed at improving skin condition. However, their experience has been less than satisfactory, with no visible results after consistent use. This reflects a continued search for effective personal care solutions that align with their holistic self-care approach, which emphasizes tangible results and quality.

Overall, the user embodies a preference for sensory-rich, high-quality products that provide relaxation and functionality, with a growing interest in effective cosmetics.
